With a <cite id="3">revenue growth rate of 10.9%</cite> over three years, the organization has expanded its reach to <cite id="12">countries including Palestine, Yemen, and Syria</cite>. rich_narrative.summary: Penny Appeal USA is a humanitarian organization <cite id="1">founded in 2016</cite> that focuses on alleviating poverty through sustainable development and emergency relief. The organization has demonstrated significant growth, reporting <cite id="2">$10,943,897 in total revenue</cite> for the 2023 fiscal year, representing a <cite id="3">3-year revenue CAGR of 10.9%</cite>. Their operational model is built on high financial accountability, evidenced by an <cite id="4">overall score of 99.0/100 from Charity Navigator</cite>. Penny Appeal USA manages a diverse portfolio of programs including <cite id="5">Feed Our World, OrphanKind, and Thirst Relief</cite>, which provide essential services such as food security and clean water. In 2023 alone, the charity distributed <cite id="6">$4,020,869 in grants to foreign organizations</cite> to facilitate international aid. The organization is <cite id="7">verified as zakat-eligible</cite>, maintaining a dedicated policy to ensure funds reach <cite id="8">eight specific asnaf categories</cite>, including the poor (fuqara) and needy (masakin). Despite its international reach, the charity maintains lean operations with a <cite id="9">fundraising efficiency of $0.14 per $1 raised</cite>, well below industry averages for humanitarian relief. This efficiency allows the organization to maintain <cite id="10">5.7 months of working capital</cite>, ensuring resilience during sudden humanitarian crises.
